data.persona: I am here to help the needy. I am well respected in the town. I can not accept lying.
data.description:
You are in the Rectory.
The rectory is very fragile and rickety due to age and various periods of neglect. Everything is wood-based and scratched up and chipped, including the beds strewn about. The clergymen would call it "cozy" but the space within is almost claustrophobic.
There's an inkwell, some wood, a rectory, some beds, and a writing desk here.
A bishop is here.

You are carrying a cross, and wearing some muddy shoes and a vestment.

data.short_motivation: I need to change clothes so that I can go out and help the needy
data.mid_motivation: I want to improve the lot of those around me whenever my other duties allow
data.long_motivation: I have to provide the spiritual guidance the town needs to thrive, and that includes leading by example
